abstract: The owner of a seafood restaurant finds something else he can harvest locally.
snippet: The owner of a seafood restaurant finds something else he can harvest locally.
lead_paragraph: One of the magical aspects of running a business is how it eventually taps into everything you know, or thought you knew. Maybe that's why you got into that particular business in the first place, without ever knowing about this secret synergy. Southfork Kitchen has drawn upon just about every experience or interest I have ever had, both obvious and all but forgotten, from music to design, food to entertainment, media to human interaction (oy, those human interactions!). More than a string of nouns, it is nearly a summation of a life.
